content: grab your favorite yarn pairing we suggest a little cashmere alpaca and silk and then knit garter stitch into the simplest pattern this shawl is a holiday for your needles and so easy to wear once it s done sizes one size finished measurements approx 92 wingspan x 22 deep at spine sample shown percy in color conversation pit and birdie in color evergreen yarn requirements *please note these are yarn estimates the amount used will depend on yarn your personal gauge and any modifications you make * dimond laine percy 100% cashmere 190 yards per 50g 3 skeins and dimond laine birdie 74% alpaca 26% silk 328 yards per 50g 2 skeins yarns held together throughout or sport to light dk-weight yarn held together with light fingering-weight yarn in the following amounts 510 yds / 465m of each yarn suggested needles *needles listed are suggested * gauge needle us 10 6mm 32 circular needle tools darning needle locking stitch marker to mark rs of fabric gauge *while gauge is not critical for this project you will want a finished fabric with some drape and it may affect the finished size and the amount of yarn used * approx 13 sts and 24 rounds = 4 in garter stitch with yarns held together blocked 1 https //thelambandkid com/collections/kits page=1
